p:
Fast Track Diagnostics Respiratory pathogens 21 (FTD21 kit) is a commercial multiplex nucleic acid amplification assay. The FTD21 kit has been evaluated using 665 samples from patients with influenza‚Äêlike illness. This kit has sensitivity of 90.7% and specificity of 100% compared to the RealStar 1.0 kit. In addition, upon modification of the FTD21 kit, the sensitivity increased to 97.3%.
